name: Texas Skies Flight School
about: Texas Skies Flight School, established in 2018, is a veteran-owned flight training institution based at Boerne Stage Airfield in Texas. Founded by Casey Ratliff, a retired U.S. Air Force fighter pilot and instructor, the school has grown from humble beginnings to become a premier flight training center. As the only Cirrus Platinum Training Center in the region, Texas Skies offers quality instruction and aircraft rental in Cirrus SR 20/22 aircraft, emphasizing safety and comfort with advanced avionics and the Cirrus Airframe Parachute System® (CAPS®). The school boasts a state-of-the-art facility with conference space, classrooms, and a Cirrus simulator, providing comprehensive training for private and commercial pilots. With a strong team of instructors and support staff, Texas Skies is dedicated to delivering exceptional flight training experiences.
